casebody.data:
Vorcelia OLIPHANT
v.
Gail HEATH, et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided April 26, 2017 Vorcelia Oliphant, self-represented, in support of the petition.

The plaintiffs petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 170 Conn.App. 360 , 154 A.3d 582 (2017), is denied.

ESPINOSA, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
